entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 13.
